name: Kobold, Sapper
description: The Kobold Sapper is a small humanoid with exceptional agility and cunning, often engaged in sabotage and tactical ambushes. It wears studded leather armor and relies on traps and explosives.
memorable: The Sapper excels in setting traps and using explosives to manipulate the battlefield, with a knack for group tactics and ambush strategies.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush enemies or sabotage structures, often working in concert with its tribe.
relations: Usually found among other kobolds, often working as part of a tribe and may be accompanied by allies to enhance its tactics.
environment: Prefers darker environments where it can exploit its sunlight sensitivity, often found in caves or underground.
strengths: Possesses exceptional Dexterity and Intelligence, enabling it to evade attacks, set traps, and strike with precision.
weaknesses: Suffers from Sunlight Sensitivity, making it ineffective in bright light.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with Mining Picks, and can throw explosives to deal area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Explosive Charge allows it to deal devastating damage in a large area and push enemies away.
equipment: Wields Mining Picks and has access to various explosive devices.
senses: Has a passive perception of 13, enhancing its ability to detect traps and ambushes.
skills: Has advantage on ability checks for picking locks and detecting traps due to its Crafty trait.
additional_information: Utilizes tactical group combat with Pack Tactics.
Can effectively double damage to structures as a Siege Monster.
Possesses an Evasion ability to avoid damage from area effects.
Can delay the detonation of explosives for strategic advantage.
Excels in intelligence-related tasks, making it a cunning adversary.
test_queries: traps and explosives in dark areas
agile kobold that excels in sabotage
